ygData.subject: Re: suggestions to Verant
ygData.msgSnippet: Simple bullet reply: - As a Wizard I am always told you will come into your own at higher levels...then you will really cast hard dmg  I think they mean
ygData.messageBody:
Simple bullet reply:

- As a Wizard I am always told "you will come into your own at higher
levels...then you will really cast hard dmg" I think they mean level
49 Ice Comet...but play the whole game to get one spell?

- Our DD should so more damage (20% more than other class DD or require
20% less mana)

- Graphical features to all Bath Robe wearers is in dire need.
-- You get that nice savants cap, black iron medallion, damask
leggings, skull of jen tra, different daggers and staff types (no new
graphics for them...warrior classes see differences in every
weapon..just about).

Thats it really. I dont think we need SPEED spells as we are not a
buffing class. We are selfish by nature and concentrate on damage. A
better damage shield would be nice because Okiels is ridiculous at
higher levels.

- Ziffnab
